wikipedia_page.main: Paul Vallé (31 December 1926 – 29 December 2004) was a British sprinter. He competed in the men's 200 metres at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

Athletics at the 1948 Summer Olympics – Men's 200 metres

response: Paul Vallée (born 1972) is a Canadian data specialist and businessperson.  He is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of Tehama Inc., a company offering a secure virtual-workforce platform in a Software as a Service paradigm.
